Field.DisplayName: Distance to be transparent (m) - 透明になりきる距離(m)
Field.Description: Near Fade minimum distance (m): Distance where α = 0 - Nearフェード最小距離(m) : α = 0になる距離

Field.DisplayName: Distance that begins to become transparent (m) - 透明になり始める距離(m)
Field.Description: Near fade maximum distance (m): Starting distance between α = Middel Alpha - Nearフェード最大距離(m) : α = MiddelAlphaとなる間の開始距離

Field.DisplayName: Distance to become translucent (m) - 半透明状態になりきる距離(m)
Field.Description: Minimum distance of Far fade (m): End distance between α = Middle Alpha - Farフェードの最小距離(m) : α = MiddleAlphaとなる間の終了距離

Field.DisplayName: Distance (m) at which it begins to become translucent - 半透明状態になり始める距離(m)
Field.Description: Maximum Far Fade Distance (m): Distance where α = 1 - Farフェードの最大距離(m) : α = 1になる距離

Field.DisplayName: Translucent darkness (α value) - 半透明状態の濃さ(α値)
Field.Description: Intermediate α value - 中間のα値
